tracks.title: Candy May
tracks.description: The opener to “Forced Witness” tells the story of a man, presumably Alex, who is in an abusive relationship with a woman named Candy May. He is deeply in love with May, and takes her abuse as an expression of her extreme affection.

annotations.range: She has seen me naked, she knows I'm packing heat
annotations.text: In most cases, “packing heat” is a slang term meaning to carry a firearm. Here, however, it is being used as a euphemism to imply that the narrator has a large penis.

annotations.range:
So I live with a deep regret
Of all I do on the internet
annotations.text:
Alex feels regret for all of the shameful things he does on the internet: watching pornography and even using dating chatrooms. What makes it worse is that he is keeping these secrets from his sweet, sweet Candy May.

This is a common theme explored throughout Forced Witness. He goes into more depth regarding this concept in the 5th track: “True Lies”.

annotations.range:
You call it as you see it, you think you know the score
But you just never had a girl like Candy May before
annotations.text: People judge his relationship and probably try to advise him to leave Candy May, but he believes that they just don’t understand the type of woman that Candy May is.
